00036 // privileges checking
00037 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('bibliography', 'r');
00038 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('bibliography', 'w');
00039 
00040 if (!$can_read) {
00041     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You are not authorized to view this section').'</div>');
00042 }

00044 $in_pop_up = false;
00045 // check if we are inside pop-up window
00046 if (isset($_GET['inPopUp'])) {
00047     $in_pop_up = true;

00050 /* RECORD OPERATION */
00051 if (isset($_POST['saveData']) AND $can_read AND $can_write) {
00052     $itemCode = trim(strip_tags($_POST['itemCode']));
00053     if (empty($itemCode)) {
00054         utility::jsAlert(__('Item Code can\'t be empty!'));
00055         exit();
00056     } else {
00057         // biblio title
00058         $title = trim($_POST['biblioTitle']);
00059         $data['biblio_id'] = $_POST['biblioID'];
00060         $data['item_code'] = $dbs->escape_string($itemCode);
00061         $data['call_number'] = trim($dbs->escape_string($_POST['callNumber']));
00062         // check inventory code
00063         $inventoryCode = trim($_POST['inventoryCode']);
00064         if ($inventoryCode) {
00065             $data['inventory_code'] = $inventoryCode;
00066         } else {
00067             $data['inventory_code'] = 'literal{NULL}';
00068         }
00069 
00070         $data['location_id'] = $_POST['locationID'];
00071         $data['site'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['itemSite'])));
00072         $data['coll_type_id'] = intval($_POST['collTypeID']);
00073         $data['item_status_id'] = $dbs->escape_string($_POST['itemStatusID']);
00074         $data['source'] = $_POST['source'];
00075         $data['order_no'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['orderNo'])));
00076         $data['order_date'] = $_POST['ordDate'];
00077         $data['received_date'] = $_POST['recvDate'];
00078         $data['supplier_id'] = $_POST['supplierID'];
00079         $data['invoice'] = $_POST['invoice'];
00080         $data['invoice_date'] = $_POST['invcDate'];
00081         $data['price_currency'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['priceCurrency'])));
00082         if (!$data['price_currency']) { $data['price_currency'] = 'literal{NULL}'; }
00083         $data['price'] = preg_replace('@[.,\-a-z ]@i', '', strip_tags($_POST['price']));
00084         $data['input_date'] = date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
00085         $data['last_update'] = date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
00086 
00087         // create sql op object
00088         $sql_op = new simbio_dbop($dbs);
00089         if (isset($_POST['updateRecordID'])) {
00090             /* UPDATE RECORD MODE */
00091             // remove input date
00092             unset($data['input_date']);
00093             // filter update record ID
00094             $updateRecordID = (integer)$_POST['updateRecordID'];
00095             // update the data
00096             $update = $sql_op->update('item', $data, "item_id=".$updateRecordID);
00097             if ($update) {
00098                 // write log
00099                 utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'bibliography', $_SESSION['realname'].' update item data ('.$data['item_code'].') with title ('.$title.')');
00100                 utility::jsAlert(__('Item Data Successfully Updated'));
00101                 if ($in_pop_up) {
00102                     echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.opener.parent.setIframeContent(\'itemIframe\', \''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'bibliography/iframe_item_list.php?biblioID='.$data['biblio_id'].'\');</script>';
00103                     echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.window.close();</script>';
00104                 } else {
00105                     echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', parent.getPreviousAJAXurl(), \'get\');</script>';
00106                 }
00107             } else { utility::jsAlert(__('Item Data FAILED to Save. Please Contact System Administrator')."\nDEBUG : ".$sql_op->error); }
00108             exit();
00109         } else {
00110             /* INSERT RECORD MODE */
00111             // insert the data
00112             $insert = $sql_op->insert('item', $data);
00113             if ($insert) {
00114                 // write log
00115                 utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'bibliography', $_SESSION['realname'].' insert item data ('.$data['item_code'].') with title ('.$title.')');
00116                 utility::jsAlert(__('New Item Data Successfully Saved'));
00117                 if ($in_pop_up) {
00118                     echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.opener.setIframeContent(\'itemIframe\', \''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'bibliography/iframe_item_list.php?biblioID='.$data['biblio_id'].'\');</script>';
00119                     echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.window.close();</script>';
00120                 } else {
00121                     echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'\', \'post\');</script>';
00122                 }
00123             } else { utility::jsAlert(__('Item Data FAILED to Save. Please Contact System Administrator')."\nDEBUG : ".$sql_op->error); }
00124             exit();
00125         }
00126     }
00127     exit();
00128 } else if (isset($_POST['itemID']) AND !empty($_POST['itemID']) AND isset($_POST['itemAction'])) {
00129     if (!($can_read AND $can_write)) {
00130         die();
00131     }
00132     /* DATA DELETION PROCESS */
00133     // create sql op object
00134     $sql_op = new simbio_dbop($dbs);
00135     $failed_array = array();
00136     $error_num = 0;
00137     $still_on_loan = array();
00138     if (!is_array($_POST['itemID'])) {
00139         // make an array
00140         $_POST['itemID'] = array((integer)$_POST['itemID']);
00141     }
00142     // loop array
00143     foreach ($_POST['itemID'] as $itemID) {
00144         $itemID = (integer)$itemID;
00145         // check if the item still on loan
00146         $loan_q = $dbs->query('SELECT i.item_code, b.title, COUNT(l.loan_id) FROM item AS i
00147             LEFT JOIN biblio AS b ON i.biblio_id=b.biblio_id
00148             LEFT JOIN loan AS l ON (i.item_code=l.item_code AND l.is_lent=1 AND l.is_return=0)
00149             WHERE i.item_id='.$itemID.' GROUP BY i.item_code');
00150         $loan_d = $loan_q->fetch_row();
00151         // if there is no loan
00152         if ($loan_d[2] < 1) {
00153             if (!$sql_op->delete('item', 'item_id='.$itemID)) {
00154                 $error_num++;
00155             } else {
00156                 // write log
00157                 utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'bibliography', $_SESSION['realname'].' DELETE item data ('.$loan_d[0].') with title ('.$loan_d[1].')');
00158             }
00159         } else {
00160             $still_on_loan[] = $loan_d[0].' - '.$loan_d[1];
00161             $error_num++;
00162         }
00163     }
00164 
00165     if ($still_on_loan) {
00166         $items = '';
00167         foreach ($still_on_loan as $item) {
00168             $items .= $item."\n";
00169         }
00170         utility::jsAlert(__('Item data can not be deleted because still on hold by members')." : \n".$items);
00171         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?'.$_POST['lastQueryStr'].'\', \'post\');</script>';
00172         exit();
00173     }
00174     // error alerting
00175     if ($error_num == 0) {
00176         utility::jsAlert(__('Item succesfully removed!'));
00177         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?'.$_POST['lastQueryStr'].'\', \'post\');</script>';
00178     } else {
00179         utility::jsAlert(__('Item FAILED to removed!'));
00180         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?'.$_POST['lastQueryStr'].'\', \'post\');</script>';
00181     }
00182     exit();
00183 }
00184 /* RECORD OPERATION END */
00185 
00186 if (!$in_pop_up) {
00187 /* search form */
00188 ?>
00189 <fieldset class="menuBox">
00190 <div class="menuBoxInner itemIcon">
00191     <?php echo strtoupper(__('Items')); ?>
00192     <hr />
00193     <form name="search" action="blank.html" target="blindSubmit" onsubmit="$('doSearch').click();" id="search" method="get" style="display: inline;"><?php echo __('Search'); ?> :
00194     <input type="text" name="keywords" id="keywords" size="30" />
00195     <input type="button" id="doSearch" onclick="setContent('mainContent', '<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR; ?>bibliography/item.php?' + $('search').serialize(), 'post')" value="<?php echo __('Search'); ?>" class="button" />

00211         FROM item
00212         LEFT JOIN biblio AS b ON item.biblio_id=b.biblio_id

00224

00229         if (!$in_pop_up) {
00230             $form->record_id = $itemID;

00233             $form->back_button = false;

00242         if (trim($rec_d['call_number']) == '') {
00243             $biblio_q = $dbs->query('SELECT call_number FROM biblio WHERE biblio_id='.$rec_d['biblio_id']);
00244             $biblio_d = $biblio_q->fetch_assoc();
00245             $rec_d['call_number'] = $biblio_d['call_number'];
00246         }
00247     } else {
00248         // get biblio title and biblio ID from database if we are not on edit mode
00249         $biblioID = 0;
00250         if (isset($_GET['biblioID'])) {
00251             $biblioID = (integer)$_GET['biblioID'];
00252         }
00253         $biblio_q = $dbs->query('SELECT biblio_id, title, call_number FROM biblio WHERE biblio_id='.$biblioID);
00254         $biblio_d = $biblio_q->fetch_assoc();
00255         $b_title = $biblio_d['title'];
00256         $b_id = $biblio_d['biblio_id'];

00265     } else { $str_input = $b_title; }
00266     $form->addAnything(__('Title'), $str_input);

00271     $str_input .= ' &nbsp; <span id="msgBox">&nbsp;</span>';

00275     // inventory code
00276     $form->addTextField('text', 'inventoryCode', __('Inventory Code'), $rec_d['inventory_code'], 'style="width: 100%;"');
00277     // item location
00278         // get location data related to this record from database
00279         $location_q = $dbs->query("SELECT location_id, location_name FROM mst_location");
00280         $location_options = array();
00281         while ($location_d = $location_q->fetch_row()) {
00282             $location_options[] = array($location_d[0], $location_d[1]);
00283         }

00298         $item_status_options[] = array('0', __('Available'));
00299         while ($item_status_d = $item_status_q->fetch_row()) {

00301         }

00340     require LIB_DIR.'biblio_list.inc.php';
00341     $title_field_idx = 1;
00342     // callback function to show title and authors in datagrid
00343     function showTitleAuthors($obj_db, $array_data)
00344     {
00345         global $title_field_idx;
00346         // biblio author detail
00347         $_biblio_q = $obj_db->query('SELECT b.title, a.author_name FROM biblio AS b
00348             LEFT JOIN biblio_author AS ba ON b.biblio_id=ba.biblio_id
00349             LEFT JOIN mst_author AS a ON ba.author_id=a.author_id
00350             WHERE b.biblio_id='.$array_data[$title_field_idx]);
00351         echo $obj_db->error;
00352         $_authors = '';
00353         while ($_biblio_d = $_biblio_q->fetch_row()) {
00354             $_title = $_biblio_d[0];
00355             $_authors .= $_biblio_d[1].' - ';
00356         }
00357         $_authors = substr_replace($_authors, '', -3);
00358         $_output = '<div style="float: left;"><b>'.$_title.'</b><br /><i>'.$_authors.'</i></div>';
00359         return $_output;
00360     }
00361 
00362     /* ITEM LIST */
00363     // table spec
00364     $table_spec = 'item
00365         LEFT JOIN biblio ON item.biblio_id=biblio.biblio_id
00366         LEFT JOIN mst_location AS loc ON item.location_id=loc.location_id
00367         LEFT JOIN mst_coll_type AS ct ON item.coll_type_id=ct.coll_type_id';
00368 
00369     // create datagrid
00370     $datagrid = new simbio_datagrid();
00371     if ($can_write) {
00372         $datagrid->setSQLColumn('item.item_id',
00373             'item.item_code AS \''.__('Item Code').'\'',
00374             'item.biblio_id AS \''.__('Title').'\'',
00375             'ct.coll_type_name AS \''.__('Collection Type').'\'',
00376             'loc.location_name AS \''.__('Location').'\'',
00377             'biblio.classification AS \''.__('Classification').'\'',
00378             'item.last_update AS \''.__('Last Updated').'\'');
00379         $datagrid->modifyColumnContent(2, 'callback{showTitleAuthors}');
00380         $title_field_idx = 2;
00381     } else {
00382         $datagrid->setSQLColumn('item.item_code AS \''.__('Item Code').'\'',
00383             'item.biblio_id AS \''.__('Title').'\'',
00384             'ct.coll_type_name AS \''.__('Collection Type').'\'',
00385             'loc.location_name AS \''.__('Location').'\'',
00386             'biblio.classification AS \''.__('Classification').'\'',
00387             'item.last_update AS \''.__('Last Updated').'\'');
00388         $datagrid->modifyColumnContent(1, 'callback{showTitleAuthors}');
00389     }
00390     $datagrid->setSQLorder('item.last_update DESC');
00391 
00392     // is there any search
00393     if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00394         $keywords = $dbs->escape_string(trim($_GET['keywords']));
00395         $searchable_fields = array('title', 'author', 'subject', 'itemcode');
00396         $search_str = '';
00397         // if no qualifier in fields
00398         if (!preg_match('@[a-z]+\s*=\s*@i', $keywords)) {
00399             foreach ($searchable_fields as $search_field) {
00400                 $search_str .= $search_field.'='.$keywords.' OR ';
00401             }
00402         } else {
00403             $search_str = $keywords;
00404         }
00405         $biblio_list = new biblio_list($dbs);
00406         $criteria = $biblio_list->setSQLcriteria($search_str);
00407     }
00408     if (isset($criteria)) {
00409         $datagrid->setSQLcriteria('('.$criteria['sql_criteria'].')');
00410     }
00411 
00412     // set table and table header attributes
00413     $datagrid->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00414     $datagrid->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00415     // set delete proccess URL
00416     $datagrid->chbox_form_URL = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00417 
00418     // put the result into variables
00419     $datagrid_result = $datagrid->createDataGrid($dbs, $table_spec, 20, ($can_read AND $can_write));
00420     if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00421         $msg = str_replace('{result->num_rows}', $datagrid->num_rows, __('Found <strong>{result->num_rows}</strong> from your keywords')); //mfc
00422         echo '<div class="infoBox">'.$msg.' : '.$_GET['keywords'].'<div>'.__('Query took').' <b>'.$datagrid->query_time.'</b> '.__('second(s) to complete').'</div></div>'; //mfc
00423     }
00424 
00425     echo $datagrid_result;
00426 }
